Content Completion Assistant in Grid Mode

body.p: If the edited document is associated with a schema (DTD, XML Schema, Relax NG, etc.), the Grid editing mode offers a Content Completion Assistant for the names and values of elements and attributes. If you choose to insert an element that has required content, the sub-tree of needed elements and attributes are automatically included.
To display the content completion pop-up menu, simply start editing a cell (for example, double-click a cell) or press on your keyboard.
